title: Trust Me as You Once Did (3U35)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert Gandalf to make a companion strength +1 for each companion with the Gandalf signet you can spot (limit +3).
Lore:	”'Do not take me for some conjurer of cheap tricks! I am not trying to rob you. I am trying to help you.'”
Rarity:	U
